## Sample Commands

### TXN simulation
```
go run main.go --data-raw '{"block":"latest","chain":"0xaa36a7","account_address":"0x4c847c87B8c6fcF2195Fa2387e686b1042cf63d1","data":{"jsonrpc":"2.0","params":[{"from":"0x4c847c87B8c6fcF2195Fa2387e686b1042cf63d1","to":"0xd8a67D3223D01467545a9109e360fC44C7F09cf6","data":"0x095ea7b3000000000000000000000000f2515945582d9fe2adddecd715ec6605c0af240c00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000186a0","value":"0x0"}],"method":"eth_sendTransaction"},"metadata":{"domain":"https://shibicoin.org"}}' --jwt 'eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCIsImtpZCI6IktnNkVUUTNKRG1vd1pyaksxeFJNWSJ9..NntXhMCQHFfQRW6B_yyhpuYgvuVRtrT2pL0CF0PqvBdiVpkU01oDDEY804TG1ZNp0FkcNp19C6MdSTjESw_CcxlFqbTypOBMY-Y8IezAf6I8bGzufeSq6UBnOMwdqxIjwSj9RX3LuTJ3ijY4vZrUR6rfzUDN0JDCHZPnanvGepgvn-v5avL-ARBvuBOC2hAhxuhF0bdC__kqnIt6O-MTQDPMJHH4kZ2abD3nXkcsIFAsFnFtrBVVwxdkuTnWRR3P38S1wF4dt1Z3JgjidyiDucnHtwojXL70eVKx0cyUKygkLfFZvzmMoWeTpfhtNS51JcQMlQYhQRmWtdAgLihvOQ'
```

### Signature Simulation
```
go run main.go --jwt "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCIsImtpZCI6IktnNkVUUTNKRG1vd1pyaksxeFJNWSJ9..NntXhMCQHFfQRW6B_yyhpuYgvuVRtrT2pL0CF0PqvBdiVpkU01oDDEY804TG1ZNp0FkcNp19C6MdSTjESw_CcxlFqbTypOBMY-Y8IezAf6I8bGzufeSq6UBnOMwdqxIjwSj9RX3LuTJ3ijY4vZrUR6rfzUDN0JDCHZPnanvGepgvn-v5avL-ARBvuBOC2hAhxuhF0bdC__kqnIt6O-MTQDPMJHH4kZ2abD3nXkcsIFAsFnFtrBVVwxdkuTnWRR3P38S1wF4dt1Z3JgjidyiDucnHtwojXL70eVKx0cyUKygkLfFZvzmMoWeTpfhtNS51JcQMlQYhQRmWtdAgLihvOQ" --data-raw "$(cat data.json)"
```
